Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is worth more than $150 to me, but I believe in making it accessible to those who appreciate its true worth. For you, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $200. It includes all the features you're looking for and more, ensuring satisfaction and long-term benefits. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. Let's make this deal happen! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
